mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( /* point.selectPointList */ SELECT
ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY T1.${orderBy} ${orderFlag}) AS RNUM,
ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY T1.REG_DTS DESC) AS RNUM,
T1.* FROM ( SELECT MAIN.* FROM( SELECT INFO.EMAIL ,INFO.NM ,TO_CHAR(RES.REG_DTS,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS REG_DTS ,RES.ORD_NO ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBL_AD_CD WHERE RES.RSV_RSN_CD = CD_NO) AS RSV_RSN_CD ,CASE WHEN RES.RSV_YN = 'N' THEN NVL(RES.RSV_PNT,0) ELSE 0 END AS USE_POINT /*사용포인트*/ ,CASE WHEN RES.RSV_YN = 'Y' THEN NVL(RES.RSV_PNT,0) ELSE 0 END AS CUR_POINT /*적립포인트*/ ,F_CUR_POINT(INFO.MEM_NO) AS TOT_POINT ,INFO.MEM_NO ,INFO.CP_NO ,(SELECT MEMGRD.GRD_NM FROM TBL_ME_GRD MEMGRD WHERE MEMGRD.MEM_GRD_NO = INFO.MEM_GRD_NO) AS GRD_NM ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBL_AD_CD WHERE CD_NO = RES.RSV_CLS) RSV_CLS FROM TBL_ME_MEM_INFO INFO , TBL_ME_RESERVE RES WHERE INFO.MEM_NO = RES.MEM_NO(+)
AND RES.RSV_RSN_CD = (SELECT CD_NO FROM TBL_AD_CD WHERE SUP_CD_NO = 'MT002' AND CD_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%')
AND INFO.${searchGb} like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND RES.REG_DTS IS NOT NULL )MAIN )T1 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startListNum} AND #{endListNum}

SELECT /* point.totallistPoint */ COUNT(*) TOTAL_CNT FROM TBL_ME_MEM_INFO INFO , TBL_ME_RESERVE RES WHERE INFO.MEM_NO(+) = RES.MEM_NO
AND ${searchGb} like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

SELECT /* point.totalSumPoint */ NVL(SUM(CUR_POINT),0) AS CUR_POINT FROM ( SELECT NM, EMAIL, CP_NO, F_CUR_POINT(MEM_NO) AS CUR_POINT FROM TBL_ME_MEM_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS ( SELECT MEM_NO FROM TBL_ME_RESERVE WHERE RSV_RSN_CD = (SELECT CD_NO FROM TBL_AD_CD WHERE SUP_CD_NO = 'MT002' AND CD_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%') )
AND ${searchGb} LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
)
